Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Ortho Clinical Diagnostics Vitros 950 AT Analyzer
Other similar chemistry automated clinical analyzers
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ILAS software accessory that automates specimen transport to clinical chemistry analyzers for in vitro glucose measurement
Indications for Use Summary: Accessory software designed to transport patient samples to clinical laboratory analyzers for in vitro quantitative glucose measurement in plasma; aids diagnosis and treatment of carbohydrate metabolism disorders
